creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: planes of color; embossed lines (rock garden) in foreground with grass and bushes beyond; dark blue calm water in middle ground; rocks and foliage at far bank at top of image; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
inscription: Left, embossed: [?????　?????] {1963nen saku, Tenryu-ji no niwa}; bottom, in pencil: [Tenryuji Garden] [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Tenryuji Garden
